alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:33PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calumet and Winnebago Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rush Lake, or 7 miles east of Berlin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oshkosh and EAA around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Central Lake Winnebago, St Anna and Chilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
